headline: Latest News In Digital Payment - Euronet Expands Through Strategic CrediaBank Partnership
summary: Euronet Worldwide, Inc. has entered into a strategic partnership agreement with Greece's CrediaBank to acquire its merchant acquiring business, signaling significant developments in the digital payment sector. This transaction, anticipated to close in the third quarter of 2026 pending regulatory approvals, will consolidate Euronet's standing in Greek merchant services by merging with CrediaBank's portfolio. headline: FIS Launches Industry-First Offering Enabling Banks to Lead and Scale in Agentic Commerce
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., January 12, 2026--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announced the launch of its first offering to enable agentic commerce on the heels of announcing the close of the acquisition of its FIS Total Issuing™ Solutions portfolio. FIS’ new agentic commerce offering is the first to enable banks to safely and securely conduct commerce with AI agents and card networks.
